## Bushman and Anderson

Effect sizes are *approximated* from a Figure in @Bushman2001.

## Effect Sizes

```{r}

library(readr)

effectsizes <- read_csv("effectsizes.csv")

library(plotly)

plot_ly(effectsizes,
        y = ~Association,
        x = ~Correlation,
        color = ~Correlation,
        text =  ~Correlation,
        name = "Effect Sizes",
        type = "bar")


```
